org.docx4j.diff
Class Differencer

java.lang.Object
  org.docx4j.diff.Differencer

public class Differencer
extends java.lang.Object

Capable of comparing a pair of: - w:body (only lightly tested) - w:sdtContent (used extensively) - w:p (includes an algorithm aimed at producing a better diff) See org.docx4j.samples.CompareDocuments for an example of how to use.

setXsltDiffx2Wml

public static void setXsltDiffx2Wml(javax.xml.transform.Templates xsltDiffx2Wml)
org/docx4j/diff/diffx2wml.xslt will be used by default to transform the diff output into a Word docx with tracked changes. This method allows you to use your own xslt instead.

Parameters:
xsltDiffx2Wml -

registerRelationship

public static void registerRelationship(Differencer pd,
                                        RelationshipsPart docPartRels,
                                        java.lang.String relId,
                                        java.lang.String newRelId)
Any rel which is present in the results of the comparison must point to a valid target of the correct type, or the resulting document will be broken. So we pass the old and new rels objects, and progressively build up a List of relationships which will need to be in the resulting document. Because the resulting document might be built out of the results of a number of diffs, we need to be sure that the id's are unique across these diffs.
